casebody.data:
Elsa HALL, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Ethlyn Louise Hall and as Successor Trustee of the Ethlyn Louise Hall Family Trust, petitioner,
v.
Samuel HALL, et al. No. 16-1150. Supreme Court of the United States Sept. 28, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted.
